meanings.definition: An area of land where oil is extracted.
meanings.sent1: The workers drilled in the oilfield to find more oil.
meanings.sent2: The oilfield was a busy place with many workers and machines.
meanings.sent3: The oilfield had a surprise visitor when a curious deer wandered in.
meanings.sent4: The oilfield was like a treasure chest waiting to be unlocked.
meanings.sent5: The vast oilfield stretched out as far as the eye could see.

meanings.definition: The industry or business of extracting oil from the ground.
meanings.sent1: Many people work in the oilfield to support their families.
meanings.sent2: The oilfield is a crucial part of the economy in this region.
meanings.sent3: The oilfield workers celebrated a successful year with a big party.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, the oilfield is a competitive field.
meanings.sent5: The oilfield buzzed with activity as trucks came and went.
